name: Feli15Puzzle
description:
Put numeric keytiles in correct order.

Use the free space to move the tiles, until ongoing from 1 the correct order from left to right and top down is restored.
At the end the free space has to be in the bottom right corner.

Hint:
The tiles don't have to be shifted. Just click on them to save time! Never say die – always solvable!

The team at FeliGames wishes a lot of fun!
